title: Turok.PROPER-ViTALiTY
description:
Turok (c) Touchstone

Protection .....: SecuROM 7.36.0012

Date ...........: April 2761  Number of Discs .........: 2
 <a href="
http://pc.ign.com/objects/773/773517.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://pc.ign.com/objects/773/773517.html</a>

GAME NOTES

You are Joseph Turok, once a member of  Wolf  Pack  -  the
most savage, merciless black ops squad of its  time.  Now,
you  have  been  attached  by  special  order  to  Whiskey
Company, an elite commando team, for what should have been
a simple mission: Capture and detain Roland Kane from  his
fortress on a worthless,  backwater  planet.  Kane  is  an
escaped war criminal, the once-legendary  leader  of  Wolf
Pack...and your former mentor.

Unbeknownst to you and your team, Kane is in command of  a
secret paramilitary  force  funded  by  the  Mendel-Gruman
(M-G) Corporation. As Whiskey  Company&#039;s  ship  approaches
the planet, it is blasted out of the sky by Kane&#039;s troops.
Now you find  yourself  stranded  in  a  dangerous  world.
Vicious prehistoric beasts of all shapes  and  sizes  roam
the terrain, attacking anything that  moves.  Your  latest
mission might end up being your last mission - for all the
wrong reasons.

Your ship is in  pieces  and  your  teammates  are  either
killed or scattered to the winds. Ruthless M-G forces  and
voracious, bloodthirsty dinosaurs  are  hunting  down  the
ones that are not dead. Your weapons  are  not  with  you.
Your mission has  become  fatally,  unrelentingly  simple:
survive at all costs.

PROPER NOTES

RAZOR1911 gave up trying to rebuild the game code  because
of all their previous fuck-ups and decided  to  create  an
emulator for the SecuROM VM.

Their emulator crashes inside the VM  after  entering  the
SecuROM virtual machine at this spot:

0040CDBC   68 361C4000      PUSH TurokGam.00401C36
0040CDC1   68 D0CD4000      PUSH TurokGam.0040CDD0
0040CDC6   68 10A4EF00      PUSH TurokGam.00EFA410
0040CDCB   C3               RETN

a crash will happen here:

0193DABD   52               PUSH EDX
0193DABE   51               PUSH ECX
0193DABF   0000             ADD BYTE PTR DS:[EAX],AL
0193DAC1   0068 02          ADD BYTE PTR DS:[EAX+2],CH
0193DAC4   0000             ADD BYTE PTR DS:[EAX],AL
0193DAC6   00FF             ADD BH,BH
0193DAC8   D250 8B          RCL BYTE PTR DS:[EAX-75],CL
0193DACB   53               PUSH EBX
0193DACC   2881 C2140000    SUB BYTE PTR DS:[ECX+14C2],AL

We won&#039;t mention their other fuckups, it&#039;s up to  them  to
find them.

It&#039;s sad to see  that  groups who were  respected  in  the
old days are simply not good at cracking anymore and force
a position by immature actions. Enjoy a true rebuilt crack
by our satanic reverse engineers.

INSTALL NOTES

~ Burn or mount
~ Install
~ Copy the crack from the ViTALiTY folder
~ Resst in pieces
